entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET console logging uses a blocking collection which is not optimal for cloud-native applications #65264
    7.0.0
  • Hostfxr.dll load failure with arm64 app on arm64 Windows 11 host #65263
  • Libraries Infrastructure and Tools work planned for .NET 7 #65260
  • Disabling runtime marshaling broke DomainControllerTests.FindAll_NoSuchName_ReturnsEmpty() #65259
  • Make yml AzDO tasks more robust by leveraging the new task retry features #65258
  • Optimize Math.Min/Max byte-overloads #65255
  • Getting file descriptor count on macOS throws #65254
  • Contention in coreclr.dll!EventPipeBufferManager::AllocateBufferForThread #65247
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `remainder by zero` crash in `System.Threading.Channels.Tests`, on browser #65245
  • [wasm][windows] Runtime assertion in `System.Threading.Channels.Tests` #65244
  • [wasm] Interpreter crash in `System.Text.Json` tests #65243
  • [wasm][aot] `memory access out of bounds` crash in `System.Collections.Immutable.Tests` with `v8` #65242
  • System.Xml.Tests.CNameTableTestModule.RunTests failure on Windows Server 2022 #65235
  • File Position in Memory vs. Append File #65234

Closed

  • [linux][arm64] Assert failure: 'regNum >= 0 && regNum <= 30' at gcinfodecoder.cpp #65175
  • Remove `ParameterInfo.HasDefaultValue` workaround #65233
  • [wasm] Avoid running work items for test suites that are not supported on browser #65210
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Tests failing with error: Invalid IL code in (wrapper native-to-managed) System.Runtime.InteropServices.PosixSignalRegistration:HandlerRoutine (int): IL_0049: ret #65177

PullRequests

Created

  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging` #65262
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • `ZeroObj` assertions #65257
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix a mono warning on linux arm64 #65256
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono] Optimize and clean-up `System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator`. #65251
    area-System.Reflection-mono, community-contribution
  • Use SSA def descriptors in copy propagation #65250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Respect single target framework values in slngen.targets #65248
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Validate `IntPtr` and ByRef field overlap #65246
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Implement StringWriter composite formatting overloads. #65241
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Improve regex code gen for non-backtracking repeaters #65240
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Change SslStream's internal adapter interface to use static abstract interface methods #65239
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Avoid Attribute.GetCustomAttributes() returning null for open generic type #65237
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [No Review] Trying Server 2022 in main pipeline #65236
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Don't report ZR reg to GC #65253
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable tests on Debug CoreClr that are already disabled on Checked CoreClr #64891
    area-Meta
  • Fix nullability in `IOptionsMonitor` #65225
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Remove unused private parameters in SPC #63015
    area-System.Runtime
  • Captures support for NonBacktracking #65129
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Obsolete and put SerializationFormat.Binary behind an appcontext switch #65139
    area-System.Data
  • Don't use Targets* helper properties in libs #64500
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Disable System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generators.Tests #65238
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-Build-mono
  • Store the result in the return local in native-to-managed IL stubs. #65203
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, runtime-mono
  • Convert over StandardOleMarshalObject to use either source-generated or manual interop. #65226
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, os-windows
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix (chrome|edge)://inspect for the debug proxy #65216
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Update Maui/Mobile pre.py's and disable android due to AOT Issue #65231
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix race condition in InteropSyncBlock for ComWrappers map. #65214
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Disable tests using external TLS1.2 server on win7 #65188
    area-System.Net
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #64999

Updated

  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Optimize Math.Round(x, MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero/ToEven) #64016
    area-System.Numerics
  • [WIP] Heuristic change for double constant adjustment #65176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Update the ConvertToGeneratedDllImport code-fix to support stripping out PreserveSig and transforming the signature when PreserveSig was set to true #65169
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Move Msquic over to Source-generated delegate interop. #65204
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Treat TZCNT/POPCNT/LZCNT as never negative #64951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT] Add MonoApi runtime tests #65221
    * NO MERGE *
  • [build] Move Mono API headers to src/native/monoapi #64569
    area-Build-mono
  • Improve vectorization of String.Split #64899
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Send CA names on Linux #65195
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Remove the Unix code from `System.Drawing.Common`. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Do not hoist constants if they will not be CSEed #64039
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix missing zero-offset sequences and add checking #64805
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not number partial definitions and `ARGPLACE` nodes #64898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle direct addresses for statics in `IsFieldAddr` #64846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use a simpler representation for array addresses after morph #64581
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Rationalize wasm jobs run on CI #65035
    NO REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add RIDs for MIRACLE LINUX 8 #61304
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix (chrome|edge)://inspect for the debug proxy #65219
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.4
  • [wasm][workload] Try to figure out how to support aot on net6.0 with a net7.0 sdk #61716
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Disable multiple tests failing in R2R-CG2 legs #65227
  • Use SECPKG_ATTR_REMOTE_CERT_CHAIN to retrieve server cert during handshake #65134
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating wasm stack traces via XHarness #65167
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Morph `Vector.Create(0)` to `Vector.Zero` #63821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE] debugging some crashes #65178
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Use C# 10's enhanced struct initialization features #63131
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Use StartsWith in regex compiler / source gen for shorter strings #65222
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Use `--emit-symbol-map` to generate a `dotnet.js.symbols` #65162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] ilc assertion failed when compiling ImageSharp #1851

PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add support for GT_STORE_OBJ and GT_OBJ #1825

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [.NET 6.0] Hot Reload unexpected and unexplained behavior #23917
  • .NET SDK 3.1 replaced the nampespace name with '_" where if ";" used #23916
  • After update to latest vs for mac and latest SDK 6 for .net getting Unable to find SDK 'Microsoft.NET.SDK.WorkloadAutoImportPropsLocator' #23912
  • Turn PackageValidation on by default #23910
  • [API Compat] add rule that make sure that delegates match #23909
  • [API Compat] add rule to make sure parameter names don't change #23908
  • [API Compat] add rule to make sure that parameter and return type modifiers don't change #23907
  • [API Compat] add rule that makes sure that type classifications are not changed #23906
  • [API Compat] add rule that ensures there is not attribute differences in between sides #23905
  • [API Compat] add rule to make sure that a member is not made more visible #23904
    7.0.1xx
  • [API Compat] add rule to make sure enum values match #23903
    7.0.1xx
  • [API Compat] Add rule to make sure that enum underlying type matches #23902
    7.0.1xx

Closed

  • [Package-Validation] Work required for the package validation to be on by default in sdk #18582

PullRequests

Updated

  • Patch 1 #21709
    Area-Compatibility

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Allow member names to match their containing type name #5758

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • INamespaceOrTypeSymbol.GetTypeMembers does not return all type members. #59517
  • ID0056 bad suggestion in netstandard2.0 #59514
  • IDE0064: Update analyzer title and associated doc #59513
  • Compiler doesn't show warning about not exhaustive switch expression #59511

Closed

  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp 4 doesn't work on .NETStandard 2.0 #59515
  • Event handler tab-completion does not work in new project templates #59488
  • Incremental source generator not called in production build context #59487

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove IBoundSwitchStatement #59516
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update issue link for a workaround in source #59512
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Ts lsp externalaccess 2 #59510
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Don't block completion for items from unimported namespaces #59045
    Area-IDE, Next
  • NavigationOptions refactoring #59505
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Only subscribe to ActiveDocumentChanged if solution cralwer is enabled #59498
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59509
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update Language Feature Status for pattern matching on ReadOnlySpan<char> #59497
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59400
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59521
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #59520
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add more tests (GetMembers, speculative semantic model) #59270
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Support parsing of checked user-defined operator declarations #59504
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Trigger refactor notify on Renamer.RenameDocumentAsync #55033
    Area-IDE
  • add all analyzers that are configured via editorconfig to code cleanup #59106
    Area-IDE
  • Handle nullability attributes in param-nullchecking #59393
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix "Add Constructor Parameter From Members" for partial classes #59450
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements" #59492
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InputTagHelper respect name override from `IModelNameProvider.Name` in ModelExpression #40182
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #40180
  • [Blazor Wasm AD B2C] Authentication OnLogInSucceeded event fired multipled times. #40177
  • Build Time Regression From Net 5 to Net 6 #40175
  • Add Results.Empty #40168
    7.0-preview3

Closed

  • Error unprotecting the session cookie #39807
  • ErrorBoundary support for multiple exceptions #38905
    Discussions
  • How remove a configuration provider? #40172

PullRequests

Created

  • Change log level from warning to debug in SignInManager #40179
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Change log level from warning to debug in UserManager #40178
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Bump follow-redirects from 1.14.7 to 1.14.8 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #40176
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • feat (Minimal) : Add `EmptyResult` #40171
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add nullability to Identity / Identity.UI #40167
    area-identity

Merged

  • Make IDE0055 formatting rules suggestions #40181
    7.0-preview2
  • Improve IIS tests #40166
    7.0-preview2
  • Add back strings.json for WebApi-CSharp #40153
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview2

Updated

  • Do less copying / zipping for Helix #40134
    area-infrastructure
  • Add analyzer to detect async void usage #40165
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [WIP] libnethost prototyping #39810
    area-runtime
  • Make InputRadioGroup preserve child elements #40148
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android app crashes when using ItemsSource property in Release mode #4650

Closed

  • FlyoutBackgroundColor doesn't work on Windows #3470
  • [Bug] Shell Flyout items are never deselected on Android #2600
  • Shell content doesn't resize when navigating between pages #3476
  • [WinUI, Shell] Shell Element Titles have no effect #9811 #1632
  • In shell App, PresentationMode.Modal does not hide NavigationBar for Top level Page #4603
  • [Shell, WinUI] Implement Shell Elements Icon property #1631
  • Unable to run Maui-Blazor app in release mode #4647
  • [MAUI] {Windows] XAML Binding Failure window displays false positives #3912
  • AppInfo.Guid #3790

PullRequests

Created

  • Essentials.Magnetometer refactored to interface and singleton #4652
  • Essentials.HapticFeedback refactored to interface and singleton #4651
  • Essentials.Gyroscope refactored to interface and singleton #4649
  • Blazor Android Open Links in Browser with Configurability #4645
  • Essentials.Accelerometer refactored to interface and singleton #4644
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4643
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • [Android] Implement RadioButton Border properties #4626
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton

Updated

  • [WinUI] Fix Flyout Background Color and Locked Flyout Margins #4639
  • [tests] Add Task.Delay to some unreliable tests #4637
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Initial work to get unpackaged WinUI apps #4460
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • [ci] Provisionator channel as a parameter on the pipeline #4620
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Essentials.Battery refactored to interface and singleton #4629
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.FilePicker WIP refactored to interface and singleton #4632
    area/essentials 🍞

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • How to troubleshoot 'Nullable object must have a value' error? #27431
  • Group By Failure - Translation of 'Select' which contains grouping parameter without composition is not supported. #27426
  • Idea for EF Core 7: Fetch aggregate entity instance and related tables in single database trip by combining AsSplitQuery and AsSQLBatch #27384

Updated

  • Operations on IQueryable after GroupBy.Select #26748
    7.0.0
  • Suggestion about IAsyncQueryProvider namespace #27401
  • Configuring the owned type on the derived type first throws an exception #27404
    7.0.0
  • Optionally allow a different connection string to be used for SaveChanges #25024
    Backlog
  • Null Coalesce Operator between two join variable - throws exceptions #27386
  • ToLower not working with AsQueryable on sqlite #27378
  • Enum values fail to convert because EF has mapped them to the wrong enum when using .HasConversion<string> #27417
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • [release/6.0] SQLite: Don't modify collection while enumerating inside ReclaimLeakedConnections #27428
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
